item.title: Kubernetes - Dynamic persistent NFS volumes
item.description: Introduction We previously configured kubernetes to leverage NFS volumes to crease kubernetes storage that moves across pods and nodes. the downside of this configuration is that only Kubernetes administratos can create volumes, its good if your org wants to control the inventary of NFS usage; not soo good if your organization wants to be more agile and reduce bottle necks.

item.title: Kubernetes- Implement persistent resources using NFS volumes
item.description: Introduction Kubernetes, with all its greatness, still needs a place where to reliably store data and make that data persist across pod restarts and nodes.
